Summary Sandra Sikora is a Toronto-based Graphic Designer. She received her Bachelor of Graphic Design at OCAD University in 2013. There she has acquired various skills and practices such as branding, photography, print, digital media, web design, marketing and business development. Since starting, Sandra has had the opportunity to work as both a freelancer and as part of great design teams, all of which to continue to further her skills and knowledge. 
 
Sandra first began her career in 2010 when she joined the Jack Nathan Health Team as the head of marketing and communications. There she oversaw the design and marketing for all Walmart Medical Clinics across Canada. 
 
In 2014, Sandra became a part of an exclusive team of Google-Trusted Photographers. This service otherwise known as Google Business View, provides businesses with the latest Google technology to enhance online presence. As part of this team, Sandra utilized her skills in photography and marketing to address the needs of Google clientele. 
 
Currently you can find her noBul Media, a digital marketing agency based out of Orangeville, where she oversees the design and implementation of all creative material. Summary OUT OF THE BOX  
 
I constantly seek innovative projects to help me grow and improve on a personal and a professional level, I am majoring in Multimedia "Arts And Design", I was a Co-founder And a head of designer Of B's Company student business initiative, I was a volunteer in DART club as a designer both At PSUT, I worked part-time with Thinker Design Company for a short period and was an intern with kharabeesh and Balad tv. 
I was a video editor and photographer and volunteering with Google, Loyac and YARA. 
To me this is not just a job its my passion.I'm always interested in trying new stuff and getting outside of the box, I'm really interested in drawing, designing, photography and video editing, I believe that success depends on our mentality: “Whether you think you can, or you think you can't--you're right.”, I love to come up with new ideas ,to help our community and help us grow and become better human beings.
